## What is ownyourclaw?

ownyourclaw is a SaaS product that gives individuals and teams a personal AI agent
that lives inside their WhatsApp (or Telegram / Slack). The agent is powered by
Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet model and connects to 20+ productivity tools.

## Core value proposition

- Natural language interface: users message their agent exactly like a friend
- Setup takes 60 seconds — no terminal, no API keys, no technical skills required
- The agent previews every write action before executing — privacy-first by design
- Available on WhatsApp, Telegram (Starter/Personal plans) and Slack (Teams plan)

## Pricing

| Plan     | Price            | Messages         | Channel                     |
|----------|------------------|----------------  |-----------------------------|
| Starter  | $12/month        | 500/month        | WhatsApp or Telegram        |
| Personal | $22/month        | Unlimited        | WhatsApp or Telegram        |
| Teams    | $49/mo/workspace | Unlimited + Swarms | Slack + WhatsApp/Telegram |

## Integrations

Gmail, Google Calendar, Notion, GitHub, Stripe, Shopify, Todoist, Linear,
PagerDuty, Vercel, Calendly, Airtable, Twitter/X, YouTube, Weather, News,
Web Search, Agent Swarms (Teams plan: + HubSpot, Jira, Shopify, Linear, Vercel)

## Technology

- AI Model: Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet
- Messaging: Meta WhatsApp Cloud API (official, TOS-compliant, zero ban risk)
- Security: credentials encrypted at rest, agent never sees raw API keys
- Confirmation: all write actions require user approval before execution
